message.body: Hello. Good morning!
Happy memorial day
Are you doing anything special today?
Not really. You?
No. not for the holiday anyways. Helping a buddy with his musical gear...maybe tattooing later. Just kinda enjoying the "Sunday, part two" vibe of the day.
Same here - hanging out in the cemetery.
Tatoos are cool. Not inked. Friend is. Has star wars on his entire back
Tattoos are weird. Especially the fact that they're mainstream. Star wars back piece - that's commitment! ;-) There's a local cemetery I've been meani
ng to go to - to take pictures.
What one is that?
I am at woodlawn on 40th and woodlawn.
Are you also in Tucson?
Nope. Philly
I was thinking about the huge on at grant and oracle.
Don't know that one
Yeah...probably won't run into you today then. ;-) I like Philly. Been many years since I've been there.
Philly is a good place to be
Yeah. I really liked it. What do you do?
Looking for a full time job. Laid off 2 yr ago at a npo that does disability rights. You?
Same. Laid off 2 yrs ago. In the meantime, I teach guitar and tattoo.
Nice. I usher and volunteer.
Cool.
I'm tired of the job market being what it is. Had a phone interview today. My fingers are crossed, but i'm not expecting anything.
Yeah. Are you from philly?
No. visited there when I lived in NYC.
Ok. Me too. It's hard to remain optimistic.
Yes, it is! All we can do is try. It's when we stop trying, that we're in trouble!
Yuppers
;-) What kind of music do you like?
Alot- david bowie to the postal service
Me too! I tend to stay on the alternative side of things. Love Bowie. Love the postal service. Death cab. Broken bells. Alkaline trio. So much...
Alkaline - someone for me to look into
Seeing postal service june 17th
Alkaline trio is considered "horror punk", but the two albums I'd recommend are "good mourning" and "crimson". Do you like BRMC? Or broken bells?
I know them. Do not listen to them.
Broken bells took a few listings before I appreciated them. BRMC puts on a great show...and their first few albums were good. The ones after that are oka
y...just okay. Supposed to see them this week. Haven't seen them in years.
That sounds like fun
The postal service sounds like fun too!
I've never seen them before. Have you?
Nope. They have been on hiatus for about 7yrs
Has it been that long? Jeez. That was (musically speaking) a fast 7 years. Did you hear all that controversy about the tryout tapes being leaked, and ho
w all these big name has-beens tried out for less vocalist before Ben got the gig? Pretty interesting...
No. That does sound interesting.
They just rereleased an album with remixes of their songs
I'm gonna have to check that out.
